translations.chinese: 上乃起舞，忼慨傷懷，泣數行下。
translations.english: The emperor then began to dance, sighing deeply and grieving in his heart, tears flowing down in streams.

translations.chinese: 謂沛父兄曰：「游子悲故鄉。
translations.english: He said to the Pei fathers and brothers: "A traveler grieves for his old home.

translations.chinese: 吾雖都關中， 萬歲之後吾魂魄猶思樂沛。
translations.english: Though I establish my capital in Guanzhong, after ten thousand years my soul will still long to enjoy Pei.

translations.chinese: 且朕自沛公以誅暴逆，遂有天下，其以沛為朕湯沐邑，復其民，世世無有所與。」
translations.english: Moreover, I from Lord of Pei executed the violent and rebellious, thus obtained the world. Make Pei my bathing county, exempt its people, generation after generation without any levies."

translations.chinese: 沛父老諸母故人日樂飲極歡，道舊故為笑樂。
translations.english: The Pei elders and mothers, old friends daily enjoyed drinking to the utmost happiness, spoke of old matters and made merry.
